mapper.insert: insert into QnA (title, id, descrip) values (#{title}, #{id}, #{descrip})
mapper.select: select num, title, views, id, date_format(date, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, descrip, answernum from QnA
select num, title, views, id, date_format(date, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, descrip, answernum from QnA where num=#{num}
select views from QnA where num=#{num}
